dialogue.introduction: I'm Miyuki. Great to meet you! It's the great Miyuki! Nice to meet you again, Commander! (Kai)
dialogue.library_intro: 4th of the special-type destroyers, Miyuki-sama! During practice, I hit another destroyer and made a bit of scene. Eh, but I gotta do what I gotta do. Watch and see!
dialogue.secretary1: Good work! Commander! Good work, wasn't it, Commander! No problem! (Kai)
dialogue.secretary2: I'll be doin' my best next time too!
dialogue.secretary3: W-wait, what are you doin'...? Oi, oi, oi! Touching me like that - how should I put it... Well, I guess it's fine! (Kai)
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ah, yeah, the area around my stomach kinda hurts but... Ah, Inazuma, you don't need to worry about me! I'm fine, I'm fine!! I'm full of energy!! (Kai)
dialogue.secretarymarried: Okay! Commander, thanks for everything! Letting loose and fighting feels kinda good! I wonder why that is... Well, who cares! Don't sweat the small stuff, yeah!? (Kai)
dialogue.wedding: Erm, umm… I like the commander!.. What is it? Don’t look at me with that face!
dialogue.show_players_score: A~h what a bother, a letter-ish thing is here~ Right! Information, isn't it! That's important! Let's take a look-see, which is it~? (Kai)
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Yea~h! Let's go~! Special-type destroyer, Miyuki, sortieing! Always wanted to try sayin' that! (Kai)
dialogue.equipment1: Let's go go~! I wanna fight soon...!
dialogue.equipment2: Thank you, commander♪ Have a nice day~
dialogue.equipment3: Yea~h! Oh well, it'll work out somehow! (Kai)
dialogue.expedition_selection: Yea~h! Oh well, it'll work out somehow! (Kai)
dialogue.resource_collection: Yea~h! Oh well, it'll work out somehow! (Kai)
dialogue.instant_repair: Yea~h! Oh well, it'll work out somehow! (Kai)
dialogue.development: Yea~h! Oh well, it'll work out somehow! (Kai)
dialogue.supply: This'll work, this'll do~ I wanna hurry up and fight! Supplies~! Much appreciated! Thanks for the meal! (Kai)
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm a bit tired, y'know~ Takin' a break!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ow-w-w-w..... What a downer~ My honour's injured.
dialogue.docking_complete: Alright! With this, she can fight again!
dialogue.ship_construction: Woah~ Looks like a new comrade has joined our fleet!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Swoosh it goes! Easy victory! Ooh! Looks like the fleet managed to crawl home...awesome! (Kai)
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Miyuki-sama's the first to arrive~ Which one is our enemy~? Well then, which of you is Miyuki-sama's enemy? Fleet, sets sail!! (Kai)
dialogue.night_battle: Woo! One mo~re time! We chasing after them? Fleet, entering pursuit!! Let's do this!! (Kai)
dialogue.mvp: Aww yeah! Hey, did you see Miyuki-sama's great performance?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: ch! You won't hit me again!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I got hit! Man, I messed up... crap.
dialogue.sunk: Sorry... I'm going ahead.... see you later...
dialogue.christmas_2014: It's nice isn't it, Christmas! It's kinda nice, and this chicken is delicious too! So, where's the present?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Woah! So, today is a special day? I complete forgot! Commander, let do our best this year!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Rainy season is such a let-down. Right, Isonami? Hey, you listening?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Ooh! How joyous! It's New Year! This year will also become a nice year!
